transcript.text: Shalom Shalom Shalom this is daniel john

<font color="#E5E5E5">Commandments Torah rule number four and</font>

<font color="#E5E5E5">you shall not make unto you any graven</font>

<font color="#E5E5E5">you might bow down to worship images are</font>
